tool_description: Compares current reading metrics against historical performance and peer benchmarks to provide context and insights.

current_period_start.description: Start date of current period to compare

current_period_end.description: End date of current period to compare

comparison_type.description: Type of comparison: historical, peer_average, or personal_best

metrics_to_compare.description: List of metrics to include in comparison

historical_periods.description: Number of historical periods to include for comparison

include_trends.description: Whether to include trend analysis in comparison

error_messages: Invalid user_id: User identifier cannot be empty
Invalid date range: current_period_start must be before current_period_end
Invalid comparison_type: Must be one of 'historical', 'peer_average', or 'personal_best'
Empty metrics_to_compare: At least one metric must be specified for comparison
Invalid historical_periods: Must be an integer between 1 and 12
Invalid confidence_level: Must be a number between 0.8 and 0.99
Insufficient historical data: Not enough past data for meaningful comparison
usage: Provide user_id, date range, comparison_type, and metrics_to_compare to analyze performance. Adjust historical_periods, include_trends, and confidence_level for detailed analysis.

comparison_summary.description: Overall summary of the comparison results

performance_changes.description: List of significant performance changes identified

percentile_ranking.description: User's performance percentile compared to selected benchmark

statistical_significance.description: Whether observed changes are statistically significant
